Name: Fruit of Fulfillment
Title: Moon's Fullness: Fruit of Fulfillment
Desc: "Even the most bitter of stories contain courage and strength... The story of the good Golden Nara's adventures with us will help good Nara defend the forest."

Talent.Name: Fruit of Fulfillment
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Draw 2 cards.\n(Can only be equipped by <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst characters</color>. Characters can equip at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
